GSD.description:
PCI: Avoid pci_dev_lock() AB/BA deadlock with sriov_numvfs_store()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.121 by commit eff3587b9c01439b738298475e555c028ac9f55e. For more details please see the references link.
